title: GEN-2328: Add non-interactive auth/config guidance to skills
description: Document SPEAKEASY_API_KEY env var and .speakeasy config file setup in skills. Critical for AI agent environments.

title: CLI: Add --output console flag to speakeasy status
description: speakeasy status currently requires TTY. Add --output console or similar flag for non-interactive environments.

title: Fix skills path in plugin.json (./skills/ â†’ ../skills/)
close_reason: Not a bug - skills path ./skills/ is correct. Paths resolve relative to plugin root (directory containing .claude-plugin/), not relative to plugin.json itself.

title: GEN-2331: Document command idempotency & side effects
description: Add Idempotency section to each skill documenting which commands are safe to retry.

title: GEN-2303: Test Claude Code plugin GitHub installation
description: Test installing plugin via GitHub after PR merge. Verify all 11 skills load correctly.

title: GEN-2329: Standardize JSON output across CLI commands
description: Add --output json flag to Speakeasy CLI commands for reliable machine parsing. High priority for automation.

title: GEN-2305: Submit plugin to Claude Code marketplace
description: Submit Speakeasy plugin to official marketplace after testing complete.

title: GEN-2332: Standardize exit codes & document meanings
description: Define standard exit code ranges and document in each skill for programmatic error handling.

title: GEN-2304: Research Claude Code marketplace submission
description: Research process for submitting to official Claude Code marketplace.

title: GEN-2330: Add native verbosity control flags to CLI
description: Add --quiet, --verbose, --summary flags instead of relying on grep/tail piping.
